# beginLoadingImageData(for:)

**Instance Method**

Starts an asynchronous fetch for image data in all locations

## Declaration

```swift
func beginLoadingImageData(for client: (any ABImageClient)!) -> Int
```

## Parameters

- **client**: The object to be notified when the image finishes loading.

## Return Value

A nonzero tag for tracking. This tag is used by the [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABPerson/cancelLoadingImageData(forTag:)] method to cancel a fetch operation.

## Discussion

The `client` object should conform to the `ABImageClient` protocol. A [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABImageClient/consumeImageData(_:forTag:)] message is sent to `client` when the fetch is done. Use the [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABPerson/cancelLoadingImageData(forTag:)] method if you need to cancel an asynchronous fetch.

## Managing Images

- **cancelLoadingImageData(forTag:)**: Cancels an asynchronous fetch of the images for a given tag.
- **imageData()**: Returns data that contains a picture of this person.
- **setImageData(_:)**: Sets the image for this person to the given data.
